page.title: 04Family Life at Bettws
page.content: On a Saturday morning Mum gets up about half past nine to take my brother to Risca for{swimming lessons. Before we go we feed the cats and Charlie the fish.Ben has 50p to spend on the sweet machine at Risca.I save my 50p to put in the bank.When we get back home I help Mum get the dinner ready. We often go out in the fresh air on Saturday afternoon.At 5 o'clock we come in to have tea and{watch T.V.}I go to bed about nine o'clock. On{Sunday}we get up at 10 o'clock.We have chicken,roast potatoes,greens and gravy for{lunch.}In the afternoon we go down to Dad's petrol station and shop to do some jobs to help him.When we come home we have tea,watch T.V. then go to bed. Natalie Coleman 2H
